text: Richard McClure Scarry (June 5, 1919 â€“ April 30, 1994) was an American author and illustrator. He published over 300 books with over 100 million sales worldwide. His work became popular in the 1960s, and led to a cartoon show on Showtime (TV channel) and Nickelodeon. ==References== ==Other websites== *Bio Category:Writers from Boston Category:1919 births Category:1994 deaths
